CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 23, 1972, pg. 19 reads: "Officials - The Modern Grandmothers officers smile prettily for the cameraman following the excellent program. Left to right: Mrs. Ethel Posey, Mrs. Gladys Harris, Mrs. Harry Washington, Mrs. Charles Jackson, president; Mrs. Oteria Nicholson, Mrs. Dorothy C. Reed and Mrs. A.L. Cyrus."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of the Modern Grandmothers Club officers, from left: Ethel Posey, Gladys Harris, Mrs. Harry Washington, Mrs. Charles Jackson, Oteria Nicholson, Dorothy C. Reed, and Mrs. A.L. Cyrus, standing in the Terrace Room of the William Penn Hotel for silver anniversary  party
